deleteMarkerReplicationStatus.description: Whether delete markers are replicated. The only valid value is `Enabled`. To disable, omit this argument. This argument is only valid with V2 replication configurations (i.e., when `filter` is used).

destinations.description: Specifies the destination for the rule (documented below).

filters.description: Filter that identifies subset of objects to which the replication rule applies (documented below).

id.description: Unique identifier for the rule. Must be less than or equal to 255 characters in length.

prefix.description: Object keyname prefix identifying one or more objects to which the rule applies. Must be less than or equal to 1024 characters in length.

priority.description: Priority associated with the rule. Priority should only be set if `filter` is configured. If not provided, defaults to `0`. Priority must be unique between multiple rules.

sourceSelectionCriterias.description: Specifies special object selection criteria (documented below).

status.description: Status of the rule. Either `Enabled` or `Disabled`. The rule is ignored if status is not Enabled.
